Interface com.chimu.form.mapping.IdentitySlot

public interface IdentitySlot
extends SetterSlot
An IdentitySlot is a special type of DirectSlot that is used to specify an Object's Identity and generate IdentityKeys.

Most of the IdentitySlot interface functionality was moved into ObjectMapper, and the remaining functionality should be considered tentative.

See Also:
ObjectMapper

Method Index

setupPostInsertIdentityRetrieverFunction(Function2Arg)
Setup the identitySlot to use the retrieverFunction after the first insert of an object to fetch the identity of the object.
setupPostInsertIdentityRetrieverFunction_decoder(Function2Arg, Function1Arg)
Same as 'setupPostInsertIdentityRetrieverFunction' except that we specify a different encoder to be used when fetching this slot.
setupPreInsertIdentityGenerator(Generator)

Methods

setupPostInsertIdentityRetrieverFunction 
 public abstract void setupPostInsertIdentityRetrieverFunction(Function2Arg retriever)
Setup the identitySlot to use the retrieverFunction after the first insert of an object to fetch the identity of the object.

The result of the retriever function will (by default) be fed into the decoder function (if any) of the slot. See the longer version of the method for specifying a different decoder.

Parameters:
retriever - (Function2Arg) will be called with the object (Object) itself as as its first argument and a connection (Connection) as the second value.
setupPostInsertIdentityRetrieverFunction_decoder 
 public abstract void setupPostInsertIdentityRetrieverFunction_decoder(Function2Arg retriever,
                                                                       Function1Arg decoder)
Same as 'setupPostInsertIdentityRetrieverFunction' except that we specify a different encoder to be used when fetching this slot.

Parameters:
encoder - (Function1Arg) will be called with the columnValue as its first argument
setupPreInsertIdentityGenerator 
 public abstract void setupPreInsertIdentityGenerator(Generator generator)
